**小剑**（stiletto）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。小剑由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，使用[小刀](/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E5%88%80 "小刀")的技能，且可以当做[发射物](/wiki/%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E7%89%A9 "发射物")使用。

[ ]

## 生成

小剑在随机生成的武器中占0.5%。

[火蜥蜴](/index.php?title=%E7%81%AB%E8%9C%A5%E8%9C%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "火蜥蜴 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄21的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一把小剑[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

## 策略

小剑的性能和小刀完全相同，但是更少见，因此一般不值得收集起来当远程弹药用——小刀更加常见，而且[匕首](/wiki/%E5%8C%95%E9%A6%96 "匕首")、[矛](/wiki/%E7%9F%9B "矛")和同样稀有的[手里剑](/wiki/%E6%89%8B%E9%87%8C%E5%89%91 "手里剑")都能造成更高的伤害。

## 历史

小剑最初于[NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0")加入游戏。自[NetHack 3.6.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.0 "NetHack 3.6.0")开始，小剑可以堆叠和多重射击。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Stiletto](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search/Stiletto "wikipedia:Special:Search/Stiletto")***

小剑（stiletto）是一种刀刃窄长，刀尖较细的匕首，一般适用于刺击，而非劈砍或切割。

随时间推移，“stiletto”一词的词义逐渐扩大，开始用于指代各种具有窄刃设计的刀具，有时还会用于描述其他细而尖的物体，例如“stiletto heel”（意为“细高跟”）。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Stiletto/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants of NetHack make the stiletto somewhat more common.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), several monsters can generate with stilettos:

- A [witch](/wiki/Witch_\(dNetHack\) "Witch (dNetHack)") has a 9⁄10 chance of generating with a stiletto.
- A [maid](/wiki/Maid "Maid") has a 4⁄5 chance of generating with a stiletto if the player character is a [Samurai](/wiki/Samurai "Samurai"), and a 3⁄10 chance otherwise.
- A [garo](/wiki/Garo "Garo") always generates with two different stilettos.
- A [garo master](/wiki/Garo_master "Garo master") always generates with two different stilettos, both of which are cursed and enchanted to +4.
- [Glass golems](/wiki/Glass_golem "Glass golem") and [argentum golems](/wiki/Argentum_golem "Argentum golem") have a 1⁄12 chance of generating with a stiletto of the same material as them, while [gold golems](/wiki/Gold_golem "Gold golem") have a 1⁄6 chance of generating with a stiletto of the same material as them.
- [Seyll Auzkovyn](/wiki/Seyll_Auzkovyn "Seyll Auzkovyn") generates with a pair of blessed [mithril](/wiki/Mithril "Mithril") stilettos.
- [Y-cultists](/index.php?title=Y-cultist\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Y-cultist (page does not exist)") have a 1⁄10 chance of generating with a stiletto - the stiletto can be made of iron (1⁄2 chance), [obsidian](/wiki/Obsidian "Obsidian") (1⁄4 chance) or [bone](/wiki/Bone "Bone") (1⁄2 chance), and has a 1⁄20 chance of being filth-poisoned.
- [Lady Constance](/index.php?title=Lady_Constance\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Lady Constance (page does not exist)") generates with a +7 [damp and psionic](/wiki/Object_properties#Offensive "Object properties") [mineral](/wiki/Mineral "Mineral") stiletto.
- [Contaminated patients](/index.php?title=Contaminated_patient\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Contaminated patient (page does not exist)") have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with a poisoned stiletto alongside a yellow [robe](/wiki/Robe "Robe").
- The [Master of Thieves](/wiki/Master_of_Thieves "Master of Thieves") generates with a blessed +4 stiletto.
- Wizard driver and wizard leader [Amm Kamerel](/wiki/Amm_Kamerel "Amm Kamerel") generate with a small stiletto that will be at least +1 and has an equal chance of being made of [bronze](/wiki/Bronze "Bronze"), [silver](/wiki/Silver "Silver") or [glass](/wiki/Glass "Glass").
- [Oona](/wiki/Oona "Oona") generates with a blessed +3 stiletto as her offhand weapon, with the object property of her weapon dependent on her elemental affinity (e.g. a fiery Oona will have an "arcing" stiletto, a cold Oona has a "forge-hot" stiletto and so on).
- [Changed](/wiki/Changed "Changed") have an effective 4⁄5 chance of generating with a bone stiletto.
- [Deeper ones](/wiki/Deeper_one "Deeper one") generated in the [Anachrononaut quest](/wiki/Anachrononaut_quest "Anachrononaut quest") have an effective 1⁄3 chance of being created with a mineral stiletto as part of their weapon set - the stiletto has a 1⁄2 chance of having the rustling property, and an independent 1⁄20 chance of being damp or faded (which can stack with the former property).
- [Duergar debilitators](/index.php?title=Duergar_debilitator\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Duergar debilitator (page does not exist)") generate with a +2 stiletto, and standard [duergar](/wiki/Duergar "Duergar") have a 4⁄5 chance of generate with a stiletto.
- [Angband orcs](/wiki/Angband_orc "Angband orc") generated in the [Mordor Ruins Quest](/wiki/Mordor_Ruins_Quest "Mordor Ruins Quest") are always created with a stiletto.
- [Carcosan courtiers](/index.php?title=Carcosan_courtier\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Carcosan courtier (page does not exist)") generated outside of the Anachrononaut quest have a 3⁄4 chance of generating with a stiletto.

### xNetHack

[xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack") removes the stiletto from the list of available objects.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), a stiletto can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining 2 [crossbow bolts](/wiki/Crossbow_bolts "Crossbow bolts") and a knife. Stilettos can be used at a forge to create a few weapons:

- Combining a stiletto with a [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear") creates a [ranseur](/wiki/Ranseur "Ranseur").
- Combining a stiletto with a [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") creates an [athame](/wiki/Athame "Athame").
- Combining a stiletto with a knife creates a [scalpel](/wiki/Scalpel "Scalpel").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), there are two [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") stilettos:

- [Oathkeeper](/index.php?title=Oathkeeper\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Oathkeeper (page does not exist)"), a neutral stiletto that has +7 to-hit and +9 damage, and is the first sacrifice gift for the [Locksmith](/wiki/Locksmith "Locksmith")
- [Spineseeker](/wiki/Spineseeker "Spineseeker"), a chaotic stiletto that has +5 to-hit and +5 damage, with a 1⁄5 chance of +d5 damage and [stunning](/wiki/Stunning "Stunning") the target for d5 turns

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), in addition to EvilHack forging recipes, [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a knife will produce a stiletto and vice versa.

## 百科文本

Possibly perceiving an expression of dubiosity on their  
faces, the globetrotter went on adhering to his adventures.  
  
\-- And I seen a man killed in Trieste by an Italian chap.  
Knife in his back. Knife like that.  
  
Whilst speaking he produced a dangerous looking clasp knife,  
quite in keeping with his character, and held it in the  
striking position.  
  
\-- In a knockingshop it was count of a tryon between two  
smugglers. Fellow hid behind a door, come up behind him.  
Like that. Prepare to meet your God, says he. Chuck! It  
went into his back up to the butt.

\[ Ulysses, by James Joyce ]

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 485](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L485)

  • Glass golems and argentum golems have a 1⁄12 chance of generating with a stiletto of the same material as them, while gold golems have a 1⁄6 chance of generating with a stiletto of the same material as them.

  • Contaminated patients have a 1⁄4 chance of generating with a poisoned stiletto alongside a yellow robe.

  • Wizard driver and wizard leader Amm Kamerel generate with a small stiletto that will be at least +1 and has an equal chance of being made of bronze, silver or glass.
  • Oona generates with a blessed +3 stiletto as her offhand weapon, with the object property of her weapon dependent on her elemental affinity (e.g. a fiery Oona will have an "arcing" stiletto, a cold Oona has a "forge-hot" stiletto and so on).

In [[SlashTHEM]], there are two [[artifact]] stilettos:

* [[Oathkeeper]], a neutral stiletto that has +7 to-hit and +9 damage, and is the first sacrifice gift for the [[Locksmith]]
* [[Spineseeker]], a chaotic stiletto that has +5 to-hit and +5 damage, with a {{frac|5}} chance of +d5 damage and [[stunning]] the target for d5 turns 

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], in addition to EvilHack forging recipes, [[upgrading]] a knife will produce a stiletto and vice versa.
